import React, { useState } from 'react' import cl from './addItemList.module.scss' import Input from '../Input/Input' const AddItemList = ({ listItems, setListItem }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ invisible: false, visible: false }) const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('') const addBtn = [cl.addItemList__btn], inputContainer = [cl.addItemList__input] if (state.invisible || state.visible) { addBtn.push(cl.invisible) inputContainer.push(cl.visible) } const addNewItemList = () => {} console.log(inputValue) return (
setInputValue(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddItemList
